name: hhmetdval
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1))))

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1))))

-| wcel(c3, cnv)
-| wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cims, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ ~H ∧ c1 ∈ ~H)→(c0[c2]c1)=(normh `(c0[-h]c1)))

⊣ c3 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ ~H =(BaseSet ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(IndMet ` c3)
